message.content: {"given_definition_quality":90,"better_definition":"a place where you can read and borrow books","sentence":"我在图书馆。","image_prompt":"A simple, soft-apocalypse style animated illustration of a library building with large windows, books visible inside, and a person standing at the entrance.
